name: Tap to Dodge - PC
description:
Tap to Dodge is a Hypercasual Endless Runner Game.

Just tap the screen to change the direction of your cube, avoid the hazards and collect all the coins to unlock new skins! 

To move, you can use: Mouse[0] - Left Ctrl - Space

This is the PC version, a port from the original game released on Android.

Have fun :)
